mods.abstract: RUN AWAY FROM the plantation of the undersigned, at Grand Coteau, in this parish, since the 7th of October, 1852, a negro woman, named CÃ©leste, aged about 30 years, about 5 feet high, speaks french and english, has no nail on the fore-finger of the righ hand. A reward of $40 will be given to the person who will bring her back to the undersigned. JEAN B. CASTILLE. Grand Coteau, Sept. 10th 1853.
